Eric Schmidt said never in his wildest dreams did he expect Google to be this successful when he joined 10 years ago. He said that himself, Page and Sergey Brin had acted as a triumvirate over the past decade with all been equally involved in making decisions. He said this policy would continue but change was needed.`` We have also agreed to clarify our individual roles so there's clear responsibility and accountability at the top of the company.''
